calculatePlaneTransform(double[], double[], float[]) - Method in class com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan.GraphmapperActivity
Calculate the pose of the plane based on the position and normal orientation of the plane and align it with gravity.
canSaveAdf() - Method in class com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan.GraphmapperActivity
Verifies whether the Tango service is in a state where the ADF can be saved or not.
chooseADFDialog(GraphmapperActivity) - Static method in class com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.dialog.Dialog
Dialog which ADF the user want to be loaded.
chooseHallwayToDrawDialog(GraphmapperActivity, int) - Static method in class com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.dialog.Dialog
Dialog for choosing a hallway from a level to be drawn on a canvas.
chooseLevelToDrawDialog(GraphmapperActivity) - Static method in class com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.dialog.Dialog
Dialog for choosing a level to be drawn on a canvas.
com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.dialog - package com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.dialog
This package contains all classes that are useful for the dialog with the user (input from the user to the application).
com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan - package com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan
A simple demo application showing how to build a 2d floor plan for indoor navigation purpose using Tango.
com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.graph - package com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.graph
This package contains all classes from the navigation graph / network.
connectAndStart() - Method in class com.projecttango.unibw.graphmapper.floorplan.GraphmapperActivity
Connect to Tango service and connect the camera to the renderer.

This function creates a list of all adf pairs stored at the device.
